articles.title: Live updates: ASB Classic women's tournament at Auckland's ASB Tennis Centre, Day One - Newshub
articles.description: But the weather could not save American sixth seed Madison Brengle from the tournament's first upset.
articles.content:
By Alex Powell
ASB Classic tournament director Nicolas Lamperin can breathe a sigh of relief, as the major names have avoided daunting first-round match-ups when play begins on Monday.
With the tou… [+1418 chars]
